input_text:
Job Title: Angular Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
AngularJS Developer - Remote, USA
About Bizcoder:Bizcoder is a pioneering software development company that thrives on innovation to solve complex challenges across various industries. Our commitment to excellence drives us to deliver high-quality, scalable, and impactful software solutions. As we continue to expand, we are seeking a dedicated AngularJS Developer to enhance our team. This full-time, remote position is available to candidates throughout the United States, offering flexible working hours between 9-5pm or 10-6pm. Bizcoder provides the flexibility of both contract and regular employment options, aiming to find the perfect match for our team and the successful candidate.
Your Role:As an AngularJS Developer at Bizcoder, you will be integral to our front-end development efforts, specializing in creating dynamic and responsive web applications using AngularJS. Your role will involve translating our company and customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications. Working closely with our backend developers and UI/UX designers, you will ensure a seamless, intuitive user experience across our web applications.
Key Responsibilities:Develop user interfaces for modern rich internet applications with the latest front-end technologies using AngularJS.Write tested, idiomatic, and documented JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.Perform product analysis and development tasks of increasingly complex nature, which may require extensive research and analysis.Ensure high performance of the application on mobile and desktop platforms.Work closely with the back-end team to integrate APIs and services.Adhere to high-quality development principles while delivering solutions on time and on budget.
Technical Requirements:Strong expertise in AngularJS framework.Proficiency in JavaScript, CSS, and HTML5.Deep knowledge of AngularJS practices and commonly used modules based on extensive work experience.Familiarity with RESTful services and experience in integrating them.Knowledge of build tools like Grunt, Gulp, or Webpack.Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.Experience with optimizing applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Experience:2+ years of experience in AngularJS development.Proven track record of developing and implementing high-quality web applications using AngularJS.Experience in using AngularJS to create scalable, maintainable, and performant web applications.
Who You Are:Passionate about creating user-friendly, effective, and attractive web applications.A problem solver with a keen eye for detail.Able to manage your time effectively and work independently in a remote setting.A strong communicator, capable of collaborating effectively with a distributed team.Eager to learn and stay up-to-date with the latest web development technologies and trends.
Join Us:At Bizcoder, you'll be part of a team that values innovation, quality, and the transformative power of technology. Enjoy the flexibility of remote work across the US, with standard working hours that support work-life balance. Here, we believe your skills and passion for AngularJS development are what truly make a difference.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Angular Developer
output_json.summary: Full-time remote position for an AngularJS Developer at Bizcoder.
job_responsibilities: Develop user interfaces for web applications using AngularJS.
Write tested, documented JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Perform product analysis and development tasks.
Ensure high performance on mobile and desktop platforms.
Integrate APIs and services with the back-end team.
output_json.company_information: Bizcoder is a software development company that delivers high-quality, scalable, and impactful software solutions.

other.content: Strong expertise in AngularJS framework. Proficiency in JavaScript, CSS, and HTML5. Deep knowledge of AngularJS practices and modules. Familiarity with RESTful services and build tools. Proficient understanding of code versioning tools.

Passionate about creating user-friendly web applications. Problem solver with attention to detail. Time management skills. Ability to work independently remotely. Strong communicator. Eager to learn and stay updated with web development trends.
